pages.title: Planes and Helicopters
pages.text: Simple Planes adds 2 different planes and a helicopter. Can be a useful tool early game to explore new areas.

pages.title: Waystones
pages.text: Can be used to teleport to other waystones. If the waystone is too far away, it will cost up to 3 levels.
The recall amulet will teleport you back to your respawn point after holding it for a while only if you are in the same dimension as your spawn point.

The warp scroll can select a destination with sneak right clicking. You can use it to teleport back to that spot but it will use up the scroll. If you throw the scroll in a portal frame made of Arcane Stone Bricks while there is a mana jar filled with mana nearby it will create a portal to that spot.
